data.title: MILES by Oliver Daly — Kickstarter
data.name: Oliver Daly
data.description: MILES is a movie about blurring the boundaries between humanity and technology, set in the off-roading world of Central California.

data.title: Help us finish Ambush Avenue! by Brian Roma — Kickstarter
data.name: Brian Roma
data.description: Please help us finish our action/comedy short film. It is a quirky comedy that pays homage to the action movies of the 1980s and 1990s.

data.title: KUNG FURY by Laser Unicorns — Kickstarter
data.name: Laser Unicorns
data.description: Kung Fury is a visually spectacular action comedy thathas its foundation in 80s cop movies.

data.title: Operation: Candlelight - Feature Film by Robin Saex Garbose — Kickstarter
data.name: Robin Saex Garbose
data.description: A band of unconventional Jewish school girls becomes a troupe of unlikely heroes in this action adventure.
